publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2170 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rules 9.6.2, 9.7.8, 9.7.9, 9.8.3, 9.10.2, 9.10.4 and 9.10.6 of the Standing Orders be suspended on Thursday 6 September 2001. Supported by: Euan Robson*
